title: The Sex Education Show 2008 Season1
description:
NOTE: This is NOT porn, it is a sex education show broadcasted by Channel 4.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Sex Education Show, Season 1 (complete: 6 episodes)
Channel 4, 2008


Anna Richardson hosts a series which aims to tackle the UK's sexual ignorance and reticence.
The series explores British attitudes to sex discovering what people of all ages know, think and do in the bedroom. Examining the rise in STIs, teenage pregnancy and the ubiquity of pornography, she discovers a country where it appears easier to have sex than talk about it. Specially commissioned surveys and discussions cover the full range of sexual experiences and their consequences.

----------------------------------
S01E01
Date: 9th Sept,2008
Anna Richardson explores British attitudes to sex, discovering what people of all ages know, think and do in the bedroom.
Examining the rise in STIs, teenage pregnancy and the ubiquity of pornography, she discovers a country where it appears easier to have sex than talk about it.
Specially commissioned surveys and discussions cover the full range of sexual experiences and their consequences.
----------------------------------
S01E02
Date:15 Sept '08
Anna puts herself through a full sexual MOT and goes back to school to show teenagers the symptoms of the most common STIs. A football team find out if testing for men is a painful as rumoured, and a group of teenagers reveal how social networking sites are used to organise sex parties with strangers. Plus, an anatomy lesson on female genitals and Anna makes her first foray into burlesque.
----------------------------------
S01E03
Date:23 Sept '08
The daunting realities of the delivery room are revealed as Anna Richardson visits the maternity ward at Countess of Chester Hospital, and Gordon Ramsay's wife Tana describes her personal experiences of childbirth. A group of teenagers get a hands-on lesson in contraception, and Anna tries to discover whether aphrodisiac foods really do boost a person's sex drive.
----------------------------------
S01E04
Date:30 Sept '08
Anna Richardson embarks on an emotional roller-coaster ride as she takes a fertility test, and investigates claims that perfumes can attract the opposite sex. She also reveals the truth about men's lack of genital hygiene with the help of Long Ashton football team.
---------------------------------
S01E05
Date: 7th Oct, 2008
Anna Richardson's exploration of British attitudes to sex continues as she gets to grips with alternative ways to lead a responsible sex life without the use of the contraceptive pill. A group of apprehensive teenagers also become `baby borrowers' for a day, and a teenage girl who has had more than 60 sexual partners talks candidly about her lifestyle.
----------------------------------
S01E06
Date: 14th Oct, 2008
In the final programme of the series, Anna Richardson organises a sex education class with a difference,
in which the inquisitive pupils will be tutored by their own parents.
However, the unsuspecting teenagers discover they are not alone in their embarrassment,
as their would-be teachers are asked to candidly reveal their own sexual histories.
Plus, Anna examines the inner workings of the libido.
